Time Limit

10 seconds (can be extended by collecting +20 second clocks) [normal]; 30 seconds (can be extended by collecting +40 second clocks) [PAT]

Additional Information

Snatcher's Tip

When I say 10 seconds, I mean it! You'd better run real fast, kiddo!

Beat the Heat

*It's much hotter than usual, cool yourself off!

Act:

Heating Up Mafia Town

Mission Type:

Death Wish - Exploration

Unlock:

Complete Heating Up Mafia Town

By unlocking Death Wish Mode through getting 27 Time Pieces and Your Contract has Expired (at the very least)

Main Objective:

Turn off all the lava faucets

Bonus:

  • Don't take any damage from heat sources
  • Don't cool down more than 2 times

Reward:

Virtual Kid Costume

Additional Information

*Tip: Take a dip after every faucet!

Snatcher's Tip

Don't Worry about doing every task on your contract at the same time. You can even come back later and do them, I don't mind! Really! TAKE ALL THE TIME YOU NEED.
